screenplay.content: FADE UP on a cold, foggy sky. The only sounds are the lapping of the ocean waves and the distant tolling of a ship's bell.
Then, chugging out of the thick mist, comes a 1940s TRAWLER.
A strange figure wearing a bright green waistcoat and wildly colourful scarf climbs the mast. This is Willy Wonka.
As he peers into the fog, he sings A HATFUL OF DREAMS.
After seven years of life upon the ocean,
It is time to bid the seven seas farewell,
And the city I’ve pinned seven years of hopes on
Lies just over the horizon. I can hear the harbour bell!
He spies a GRAND OLD CITY looming out of the freezing fog.
Willy grabs a rope and ABSEILS DOWN to the deck as the other sailors prepare the boat to come into harbour.

Willy travels through the engine room, gathering his tattered
old PLUM-COLOURED TAILCOAT and battered WOODEN SUITCASE.
Got a tattered overcoat and battered suitcase!
Got a pair of leaky boots upon my feet.
Got to drag myself up by my one good bootlace!
Gotta work my rotten socks off if I wanna make ends meet!
He leaps onto a CRATE as it is CRANED up out of the hold.
The crate is hoisted round over the wharf.
I've poured everything I've got into my chocolate.
Now it's time to show the world my recipes.
The CAPTAIN throws him a small bag of coins.
I've got twelve silver sovereigns in my pocket
Willy drops from the crate onto the back of a passing TRUCK and rides out of the docks in style.
WILLY LEAPS off the back of the truck, GRABS HOLD of a lamp post and SLIDES DOWN into the resplendent town square.
On one side stands a CATHEDRAL, on the other, a cathedral of commerce: a great, glass-domed SHOPPING ARCADE. In the middle sits a huge FOUNTAIN, its water FROZEN SOLID in the cold.
There’s a famous restaurant on every street here,
There's Brandino's and the Bar Parisienne.
Got a little map to tell me where to eat here...
Willy unfolds his map -- then notices someone at his feet. It is a SHOESHINE BOY, upon whose box Willy has inadvertently placed one foot. The boy demands a sovereign. Willy pays up.
Had a dozen silver sovereigns, now I'm somehow down to ten!
Willy goes over to a fruit stall and picks up a pumpkin.
Want the finest produce? This is where they stock it!

A STREETCAR PASSES, narrowly missing Willy, who drops the
pumpkin in surprise. It splats all over his boots.
Though the prices are suspiciously extreme!
You break my pumpkin, you pay for it.
As he counts his coins, Willy spots the Shoeshine Boy cleaning his boots again -- and reluctantly hands over yet another sovereign.
The Shoeshine Boy follows Willy towards the GALERIES GOURMET.

characters.name: Willy Wonka.
characters.description: Willy Wonka is a traveler, an adventurer and chocolate maker.
characters.visualDetails: He is a slender long young man with messy, curly brown hair and a worn brown top hat. He wears a long magenta velvet coat over a colorful scarf and striped trousers. He completes the look with lace-up boots and a wooden walking cane.

aesthetics.color_scheme: rich and vibrant, with emerald green and chocolate browns contrasting with pops of bright colors from the scarf and background elements
aesthetics.composition: centered, full-body shot, allowing the viewer to take in Willy Wonka's full attire and the surrounding environment
aesthetics.mood_atmosphere: whimsical, magical, adventurous, and slightly mysterious

structured_prompt.background_setting: A fantastical chocolate factory interior, filled with oversized chocolate fountains, pipes carrying liquid chocolate, and whimsical machinery. The walls are made of edible-looking materials, and there are hints of giant lollipops and candy trees in the distance. The overall impression is one of magical industry and sweet wonder.
structured_prompt.context: This is a cinematic digital illustration of Willy Wonka in his chocolate factory, designed to evoke a sense of wonder and adventure, potentially for a movie poster or concept art.

lighting.direction: diffused, coming from above and slightly in front
lighting.shadows: soft, subtle shadows that define form without harshness

objects.appearance_details: His top hat is slightly askew, suggesting a life of adventure. His colorful scarf adds a touch of whimsical flair. His striped trousers are a mix of brown and cream.

structured_prompt.short_description: Willy Wonka, a slender young man with messy, curly brown hair and a worn brown top hat, stands confidently in the heart of a fantastical chocolate factory. He wears a long emerald green velvet coat over a colorful scarf and striped trousers, complemented by lace-up boots and a wooden walking cane. The factory is a vibrant, whimsical space filled with oversized chocolate creations and machinery, creating an atmosphere of magical industry and sweet wonder. He is looking directly at the viewer with a slight, knowing smile, ready to embark on a new adventure or unveil a new confection.

objects.description: A sturdy white mast of a trawler, from which the man is abseiling. Ropes and rigging are visible, indicating its function.
objects.orientation: Vertical.
objects.relationship: The mast is the structure the man is descending from.
objects.shape_and_color: Tall, cylindrical, white.

objects.appearance_details: Railing details, possibly some fishing gear or deck equipment.
objects.description: The deck of a trawler, with railings and various nautical equipment visible. It is the destination for the abseiling man.
objects.orientation: Horizontal, extending across the frame.
objects.relationship: The deck is below the man, his target for descent.
objects.shape_and_color: Flat, broad, dark-colored with white railings.

photographic_characteristics.camera_angle: Low angle, looking up at the man descending.
photographic_characteristics.depth_of_field: Deep, with the man and trawler in sharp focus and the background slightly blurred.
photographic_characteristics.focus: Sharp focus on subject and immediate surroundings.

structured_prompt.short_description: A cinematic wide shot captures a man in a bright green waistcoat and wildly colorful scarf actively abseiling down the mast of a trawler towards its deck. The scene is dynamic, with the man in mid-descent, his scarf dramatically flowing in the wind, emphasizing movement and adventure. The trawler is visible from a side angle, with the ocean and a distant, blurred coastline forming the backdrop, suggesting a journey or escape.

1.description: Man in bright green waistcoat and wildly colorful scarf standing on the mast of trawler, grabs a rope and ABSEILS DOWN towards the deck. A side shot of descend.
1.scriptContext: Willy grabs a rope and ABSEILS DOWN to the deck

aesthetics.color_scheme: warm and natural, with blues of the sky and sea contrasting with the browns of the ship and clothing, and the dark uniform of the captain.
aesthetics.composition: centered, with the captain as the focal point, surrounded by other figures
aesthetics.mood_atmosphere: tense, dramatic, yet clear and bright due to the sunny conditions.

structured_prompt.background_setting: The open sea under a bright, cloudless blue sky. The ocean is calm with gentle waves, reflecting the sunlight.
structured_prompt.context: This is a dramatic historical scene, possibly from a film or a historical reenactment, depicting a moment of crisis or command on a sailing vessel.

lighting.shadows: short, soft shadows, indicating high sun

objects.appearance_details: Wrinkled face, gray hair visible under cap, determined gaze.
objects.clothing: Dark blue naval uniform with gold epaulets, buttons, and sleeve stripes; white shirt collar visible; dark naval cap with insignia.
objects.description: An older male captain with a stern expression, wearing a dark blue naval uniform with gold trim and a matching cap. He holds a pistol in his outstretched right hand, pointing it forward.
objects.orientation: Facing slightly right, body angled towards the viewer
objects.pose: Standing upright, right arm extended forward, left arm slightly bent at his side.
objects.relationship: The central figure, commanding attention from the surrounding sailors.
objects.shape_and_color: Human figure, dark blue uniform with gold accents

objects.action: Reacting to the captain's actions or an external event.
objects.appearance_details: Some have beards, various expressions of concern or fear.
objects.clothing: Simple shirts, vests, trousers in browns, grays, and off-whites; some with hats.
objects.description: A group of male sailors, some looking distressed or reacting to the captain's action. They are dressed in period-appropriate working clothes.
objects.orientation: Various, mostly facing towards the captain or forward
objects.pose: Various, some with hands raised, some looking towards the captain or forward.
objects.relationship: Subordinates to the captain, reacting to the situation.
objects.shape_and_color: Human figures, various earthy tones of clothing

objects.appearance_details: Tied at the top, suggesting contents are contained.
objects.description: Three small, roughly spherical sacks, appearing to be filled with something, are suspended in mid-air.
objects.orientation: Floating in various orientations
objects.relationship: Unclear, possibly thrown or falling objects, adding to the tension.
objects.shape_and_color: Irregular spherical, beige/brown

objects.appearance_details: Some scattered equipment and coiled ropes.
objects.description: The wooden deck of a sailing ship, showing planks and various ropes and equipment.
objects.orientation: Horizontal, receding into the background
objects.relationship: The setting for the scene, providing context.
objects.shape_and_color: Flat, rectangular planks, brown

objects.appearance_details: Sails are furled or partially furled, rigging is complex.
objects.description: The rigging and sails of a large sailing ship, partially visible.
objects.orientation: Vertical and horizontal elements
objects.relationship: Part of the ship, providing a sense of scale and maritime setting.
objects.shape_and_color: Vertical masts, horizontal spars, white sails

photographic_characteristics.camera_angle: eye-level, slightly elevated to look down on the deck
photographic_characteristics.depth_of_field: medium to deep, with the captain and immediate surroundings in sharp focus and the background slightly less defined.

structured_prompt.short_description: A stern, older male captain in a naval uniform stands on the deck of a sailing ship, pointing a pistol forward. He is surrounded by a group of sailors, some of whom appear to be in distress or reacting to an unseen event. The ship is sailing on a calm, sunny sea under a clear blue sky.

1765557806745.description: Captain throws a small coin bags.
1765557806745.scriptContext: The CAPTAIN throws him a small bag of coins.
